connectionName.description: The name of the connection to use to connect to the JDBC target.

enableAdditionalMetadatas.description: Specify a value of `RAWTYPES` or `COMMENTS` to enable additional metadata intable responses. `RAWTYPES` provides the native-level datatype. `COMMENTS` provides comments associated with a column or table in the database.

exclusions.description: A list of glob patterns used to exclude from the crawl.

path.description: The path of the JDBC target.
